label: A8B_tI18_139_hi_a-001
title: Pt$_{8}$Ti Structure
comments: When $a=3/(\sqrt{2})a_{fcc}$, $c=a_{fcc}$, $x_{2}=1/3$, and $x_{3}=1/3$ the atoms are on the sites of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF4_225_a-001}{fcc lattice}. Compare this structure to the very similar \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B5_tI18_139_i_ah-001}{V$_{4}$Zn$_{5}$.}
